resources.string: Habari Hub is a lightweight app created to integrate major Tanzania news sources into one place. We are NOT affiliated to any source used in this app

Please contact developer(s) for source code
By selecting start using habarihub you agree to terms and conditions,and permissions requested by this app.

Thank you for downloading our app. Here is a quick tutorial how to use HabariHub:

1.Select a category e.g. Newspapers
2.Select a source e.g. Mwananchi
3.Select article
4.SWIPE between articles, right for older, left for newer
5Share article with friends

Do not forget to rate HabariHub on playstore, and use the report menu to report bugs/suggestions and we will work on them
Habari Hub is a lightweight app created to integrate major Tanzania news sources into one place. We are NOT affiliated to any source used in this app

Thank you for being part of this app, as of now this app is in early development stages. Timeline for this app is as follows:
1st June 2013 \- Alpha Release
1st July 2013 \- Beta Release
1st August 2013 \- Final Release.
Almost everything right now is in webView but we are working hard to bring everything native. 
NB: Dates are subject to change at any given time.
There was an error initializing the YouTubePlayer (%1$s)
